biocontainers.name: fqtrim
biocontainers.summary: fqtrim is a versatile stand-alone utility that can be used to trim adapters, poly-A tails, terminal unknown bases (Ns) and low quality 3' regions in reads from high-throughput next-generation sequencing machines.

biotools.summary: Utility for filtering and trimming high-throughput next-gen reads.

bioschemas.name: fqtrim
bioschemas.summary: Utility for filtering and trimming high-throughput next-gen reads.
